posts.title: Vynspire AI Labs: Frontend Developer Technical Task
posts.content:
Vynspire AI Labs HR <hr@vynspirelabs.ai>
Attachments
Jan 18, 2026, 2:27 PM (2 days ago)
to bidhanpoudel10, bcc: me

Dear Candidate,

Congratulations on being shortlisted for the Technical screening for the Frontend Developer position at Vynspire AI Labs! We were impressed with your background and skills, and we’re excited to move forward with your application.

Technical Task: As part of the selection process, we’d like you to complete a technical task designed to assess your problem-solving and coding abilities. Your performance in this task will determine whether you advance to the next stage—a technical interview with our team.

The details of the technical task are mentioned below:
Estimated Time: Maximum 2-3 Hours 
Deadline: 21st January, Wednesday, 2026.
Time:  12:00 P.M. (NPT)
Submission: Zip File or Github Repo Link
